title: Utilizing Predictive Analysis for Decision-Making on the Accreditation of Academic Programs
description: The result of this study will be used as a foundation structure of the QA office and the university to address the recurring Areas needing improvement.

title: Asset Management System
description: This system assists in maintaining and organizing IT inventory, including computers, routers, and network equipment. Provide basic technical support in the IT office.

title: 3D Printer Shop Website.
description: The website is has a function of buy, add to cart, add to favorites. The admin can post their own product and user/customer can buy items in the website.

title: Writing Letters through air using CNN. Final Project for Software Engineering.
description: This is our final project for Software Engineering. The system can detect letters through air with just a pen. Our objective is to have cheaper learning material for childrens and teachers.

title: Calculator for Quantitative Methods.
description: We created this in our second year for the final project of Quantitative methods. This calculator covers all quantitative equations we discuss in this subject.
